title: Can no longer drag my camera view on minimap
body:
I've been searching for a solution to this issue for around 2.5 hours now, I thought it'd be simple to solve but am having issues. When I left click the mini-map and try drag my camera view, it won't allow it. It only happens on one of my league accounts, but the other it seems to work fine. Their used to be an option allowing for clicking on mini-map but now I can't see it in the client. 

I've tried several things including deleting the config, resetting everything to defaults, restarting PC, restarting league, repairing league etc. I'm really unsure why it happens only on one account and not the other, any help would be greatly appreciated!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like you're not resetting your configuration correctly, please follow the steps outlined below.

* Login to the client (which syncs your settings with the server)
* Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
* Delete the "Persisted.json", "game.cfg" &"input.ini" files
* Launch a custom game
* Exit the custom game
* Exit the client

Let me know if that helps.
